name: Holm or Home
description:
This was my own take on just an idea for the jam. I wasn't able to finish it because I was working with the Indie Game Devs for the Untitled Seagull Simulator, but I decided to post this anyway. Right now it's just a exploration of a strange island, but so much more will be added in the future. The idea as follows:

You wake up on a strange island with people who speak a strange language you don't understand. You must figure out what they are saying in order to figure out if the paradise is Holm or Home.

Credits to:

Low Poly Nature collection by Eclypso
LowPoly Water by Ebru Dogan
Blues (Music) by patrickdearteaga.com
